You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, but received error messages indicating that necessary files could not be found. The latest attempt involved using the command "source /home/atlas/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate arcgis", but it returned an error message indicating that the file "/home/atlas/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" could not be found.
"""
